channel.title: Tim Stoner on Artangled
channel.description: Recent content in Tim Stoner on Artangled

item.title: Tim Stoner - Al-Andalus | Modern Art
item.description: At last, at last, many of London’s commercial galleries have reopened. As the country emerges from its lockdown, for better or worse, things aren’t quite back to normal. A spontaneous tour through open galleries isn’t going to be possible for a while: all of my visits have been by appointment. This extra element of necessary planning isn’t a bad thing though - it makes you more considered about what you want to see.
